name: as
signature: { <A2>(value: A2): <A, E>(self: Exit<A, E>) => Exit<A2, E>; <A, E, A2>(self: Exit<A, E>, value: A2): Exit<A2, E>; }
description:
Maps the `Success` value of the specified exit to the provided constant
value.
documentation:
Maps the `Success` value of the specified exit to the provided constant
